name: ViralRank™
author: Rex Dixon

sections.description: ViralRank™ which is a technology created for http://swarmsports.com can be used anywhere to show how viral a post is. We wrote a blog post announcing the release of this to the world: http://blog.swarmsports.com/2013/07/16/our-new-wordpress-plugin-is-the-tits/ – If you want more awesome ViralRank stuff, sign up for the FREE dashboard – http://viralrank.me/dashboard/ – you can play around with all kinds of cool statistical data there. Enjoy!
sections.installation: Upload the ViralRank Plugin to your site. Activate.
sections.faq:
Q: Will this only show the ViralRank of posts or pages too?

A: It will show ViralRank of your pages too.

Q: Is the only thing I need to do is click the activate?

A: Yes!
sections.changelog:
0.1.6

  • checked that this version is working well with WP v3.8

0.1.5

  • checked that this version is working well with WP v3.7.1

0.1.4

  • removed the php function file_get_contents as hosting services seem to like to turn that off, recoded with cURL and json.

0.1.3

  • move the api server to aws http://api.viralrank.me

0.1.2

  • added another api server to serve up the public WP plugin version of ViralRank

0.1.1

  • added the text ViralRank: so that the number that shows up on your posts is known.
  • linked the ViralRank to the faq page http://blog.swarmsports.com/faq/#ViralRank so no explaining to your readers is necessary

0.1

  • Basic v0.1 of the plugin is written 7/11/2013

short_description: This plugin does one thing - it will show the ViralRank of your blog posts.
description: ViralRank™ which is a technology created for http://swarmsports.com can be used anywhere to show how viral a post is. We wrote a blog post announcing the release of this to the world: http://blog.swarmsports.com/2013/07/16/our-new-wordpress-plugin-is-the-tits/ – If you want more awesome ViralRank stuff, sign up for the FREE dashboard – http://viralrank.me/dashboard/ – you can play around with all kinds of cool statistical data there. Enjoy!

upgrade_notice.0.1.1: If you were early and grabbed v0.1, you will want to show ViralRank near the number so people know what that number is!
